item.title: Favourite Books
item.description: How to Win Friends and Influence People If you talk to other humans, if you interact with humans, you must read this book. No exceptions. All my life, people told me that making friends and influencing people is an artform - something you can’t learn. This book showed me the hidden rules required to win friends. Since reading this book, every aspect of my friendships / relationships have gone up tenfold.
